story_p1: Our love story began seven years ago in Athens. What started as a first date on a rooftop bar has blossomed into the greatest adventure of our lives.
story_p2: From our first years of traveling for our long distance relationship, we upgraded to sharing a home and to traveling the world together. Every moment has been filled with laughter, growth, and endless love. We've supported each other through challenges and celebrated countless joys.
story_p3: Now, we can't wait to celebrate our marriage together with all of you - the friends and family who have made our story even more beautiful.
details_dresscode_line2: Tux or Dark Suit for Gentlemen,
details_dresscode_line3: Evening Gown or Long Dress for Ladies
timeline_item1_p: Arrive at the Palais, catch up with family and friends, and find a seat. The ceremony will start shortly.
timeline_item2_p: Join us as we exchange vows in the beautiful oval room.
timeline_item3_p: We move to the Damensalon to cut the cake while you grab a glass of sparkling wine to cheer with us.
timeline_item4_p: We take a big group picture on the grand staircase.
timeline_item5_p: A delicious three-course dinner featuring locally sourced ingredients, catered by Café Central, accompanied by surprises. Local wines, beer and water are included.
timeline_item6_p: We open the floor with our first dance and start the party, so do not forget to pack your dancing shoes!
venue_p1: We are looking forward to celebrate with you in one of Vienna's Baroque jewels, the Palais Daun-Kinsky. Built between 1713 and 1719 by Johann Lucas von Hildebrandt, who was also the architect of the Belvedere Palace, it has been home to various noble families, served as police headquarters, an embassy, and hosted international negotiations, all to prepare for its most important event yet, our wedding celebrations.
venue_p2: Located in the first district, it is easy to reach both by public transport and car. It is a five-minute walk from both the metro stations Herrengasse (U3) and Schottentor (U2). The latter is serviced additionally by many tram lines. From Stephansplatz (U1), it is a twelve-minute walk. If you come by car, there is a paid underground garage at the square in front of the Palais
venue_p3: When you arrive at the venue take the main staircase to the left of the entrance to the second floor (there will be signs).
photos_p: Share photos you took at our wedding and look at our album: Wedding Album
gifts_p1: Your presence on our wedding day is the greatest gift we could ask for. We are so excited to celebrate with you!
gifts_p2: If you would like to honor us with a gift, we kindly ask for a financial contribution toward our future together, as we begin this next chapter of our lives.
vienna_museums_h1: Museums and Historical Sights in Vienna
vienna_museums_intro: If you want to see art specific to Austria, these museums are a great place to start:
vienna_albertina: Albertina: This museum focuses on classical art, including famous works like Dürer's "Young Hare," and often features changing exhibitions.
vienna_belvedere: Upper Belvedere: Home to the most famous paintings by Gustav Klimt, including "The Kiss."
vienna_leopold: Leopold Museum: This museum houses a beautiful collection of Austrian artists from the Jugendstil (Art Nouveau) period around 1900.
vienna_hofburg: Hofburg Palace, where you can see the Imperial Apartments and the Imperial Treasury and the World Museum.
vienna_schonbrunn: Schönbrunn Palace: walk in the beautiful park and visit the Schönbrunn Zoo.
vienna_food_drinks_intro: If you want to try Austrian cousine, the best way is in a traditional coffee house or a winery. Thus, for restaurants, we focussed on our everyday favourites featuring international cousine.
vienna_coffee1: Cafe Diglas im Schottenstift Ákos' favourite classic coffee house.
vienna_coffee2: Goldener Papagei Angie's favourite contemporary Café.
vienna_winery1: "Heuriger Wolff" Our favourite in Neustift.
vienna_winery2: Feuerwehr Wagner Our favourite in Grinzing.
vienna_winery3: Stadtheuriger Our favourite in the city center.
vienna_restaurant2: Ilona Stüberl If you want to try Hungarian Food.
vienna_restaurant3: Pizza Riva We have eaten countless pizzas in their pizzerias.
footer_p1: We can't wait to celebrate with you!
